meta.question: Homophones are words that sound the same but have different spellings and meanings. eg. My friends and I buy lunch at school. Buy means to pay for something. Then we all eat together by the big tree. By means near.We say bye to each other when the bell rings. Bye is short for goodbye.

content.word: they're  there means at, to or in that place. they're means they are.
content.description:
Complete the sentence with the correct homophone.
Charles and Frank are neighbors, and ____ friends.

content.word: know  know means to have information regarding anything. no means to refuse, to deny
content.description:
Complete the sentence with the correct homophone.
I ___ a nice place for picnic.

content.word: flu.  flew means to fly. flu means viral disease
content.description:
Complete the sentence with the correct homophone.
She was sick with the ____

content.word: bee  be means occur, to take place. bee means an insect.
content.description:
Complete the sentence with the correct homophone.
The __ landed on those bush.
